mapper.select: select province.province_id, province.province_name, province.province_update_time, province.province_state_id from province where province.province_delete_or_not=1 and province.province_id=#{provinceId}

select province.province_id, province.province_name, province.province_update_time, province.province_state_id from province where province.province_delete_or_not=1 and province.province_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{provinceName}), '%')
select province.province_id, province.province_name, province.province_update_time, province.province_state_id from province where province.province_delete_or_not=1
